Race.SpecificTitle: PW Proposition (Council on Aging) -- 1 Mill Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Madison, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a special tax of one (1) mill on all the property subject to taxation within the Parish (an estimated $107,500 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2021 and ending with the year 2030, to acquire, improve, maintain, operate and support facilities, equipment, vehicles, programs and services for senior citizens of the Parish, including paying salaries and providing funding for facilities, equipment, vehicles, programs and services provided by the Madison Voluntary Council on Aging?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Proposition (Hospital/Police Jury) -- 1/2% S&U Tax Reded. & Ext. - PJ - 20 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Madison, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), be authorized to rededicate the levy and collection of an existing parishwide sales and use tax of one-half of one percent (1/2%) (the "Tax") (an estimated $710,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year) upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and the storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and upon the sale of services in the Parish, all as defined by law, for an additional period of twenty (20) years, from January 1, 2022, with the proceeds of the Tax, hereafter collected to be dedicated as follows: (a) 50% for acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating the Madison Parish Hospital, including furniture, fixtures and equipment and (b) 50% for the Police Jury's general fund?
